page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: My mum wakes me up at about 7.30am.For my breakfast I eat Shreddies with cold milk and sugar followed by a cup of tea.I have to set off to go to school at 8.40 as it starts at 9.00. When we get to school the teacher checks the register to see who is present,after that we go to a religious assembly.After assembly we have 4 lessons each lasting half an hour.Lunch time lasts for 1 hour,I stay for school meals,there is a choice of 3 first courses and 3 sweets.It costs 2 pounds to stay for dinners for 1 week. When lunch is over we have 4 more half hour lessons.We take subjects such as Mathematics,English,French,Science,P.E. Craft Design Technology,Geography,R.E. History,Art,Music,Home Economics,and some pupils take German. Most nights I go straight home after school but sometimes stay for clubs.
